mean_en: (in the Christian, Jewish and Muslim religions) a person sent by God to teach the people and give them messages from God; a person who claims to know what will happen in the future
sentence: The prophet said he would have a bad day.
sentence_trans: 这位先知说他（包大人）今天（印堂发黑）运势不佳。
word_etyma: pro在前 + phet=phanai说出 → prophet能提前说出的人先知，预言者
